function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in park use based on income and education level","Impact":"Exclusion of lower-income and less educated individuals from park use, leading to reduced physical activity and social interaction","Mitigation":"Provide affordable and accessible recreational spaces, programs, and initiatives for all income and education levels","Technologies":"Smart city planning for equitable distribution of parks and recreational facilities","People":"Lower-income and less educated individuals","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Disparities in park use based on race/ethnicity","Impact":"Unequal access to parks and recreational opportunities, resulting in social inequality and health disparities","Mitigation":"Implement inclusive park design and programming that reflects the diversity of the community, and address systemic barriers to park access","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data-driven decision-making for equitable park distribution","People":"BIPOC individuals, marginalized communities","Owner":"City planning departments, community leaders, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Changes in park use during COVID-19","Impact":"Disruption of physical activity routines and mental well-being due to reduced park usage, potential overcrowding in remaining open spaces","Mitigation":"Promote safe and responsible park use, increase access to outdoor amenities, and prioritize equitable park maintenance and management","Technologies":"Smart park monitoring systems, mobile applications for park capacity tracking","People":"Park visitors, local residents","Owner":"Parks and recreation departments, public health agencies, city councils"}]}
